sentence: Also in North Carolina, Madison Cawthorn's eligibility to appear on the ballot this November has been challenged by a group of voters under an unusual and interesting North Carolina law that is based on the 14th Amendment.
title: Highlights from The Downballot: North Carolina, South Korea, and why you should Run for Something

author: Adam Brewster
title: Supreme Court tosses Wisconsin state legislative maps but keeps congressional maps in place
